title: Babayan-nawu
author: Babayan-nawu
content: Good day to members of this great community.From my research,reading and studies I saw alots about  Bitcoin and Altcoin which still don't get it clearly specifically (Altcoin) well,Bitcoin is reefers to the first largest cryptocurrency and  the most widely accepted and recognized cryptocurrency with a strong security of high market capitalization.Now I learnt that the Altcoin  was lunched after Bitcoin and it was created by various individuals less widely accepted and lower market capitalization, Although I got understood the bitcoin clearly but my questions is now base on this Altcoin,since it was created by various individuals,does Altcoin deals with a specific cryptocurrency or many cryptocurrency ?Would the experienced expertise provide a neccessary examples and breakdown of this Altcoin to my level of understanding?Thank you all for putting me through.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Quote from: Babayan-nawu on October 23, 2024, 08:04:29 AMNow I learnt that the Altcoin  was lunched after Bitcoin Not really, there were few cryptocurrency launched before Bitcoin https://www.investopedia.com/tech/were-there-cryptocurrencies-bitcoin/The definition of altcoins is other coins except Bitcoin, the specific versions of altcoins are privacy coins, stable coins, meme coins, gambling coins etc https://www.coingecko.com/en/categoriesSome users call altcoins with "shitcoins" because most of them didn't offer any use case.

comments.author: MeGold666
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on October 23, 2024, 08:17:12 AMQuote from: Babayan-nawu on October 23, 2024, 08:04:29 AMNow I learnt that the Altcoin  was lunched after Bitcoin Not really, there were few cryptocurrency launched before Bitcoin https://www.investopedia.com/tech/were-there-cryptocurrencies-bitcoin/Bitcoin was the first truly decentralized cryptocurrency thanks to Proof of Work which was the point of the whole revolution.As for the "Altcoin" - it's just a term to describe any other cryptocurrency project made after Bitcoin.Simple as that.

comments.author: bigmanik
comments.body: Firstly, you should know what ALTcoins stand for, which is an alternative coin. This basically means that it is any cryptocurrency other than Bitcoin They are usually used when, for one reason or the other, you can't or don't want to use Bitcoin So, no, they don't deal with specific cryptocurrency it is a general term that covers other cryptocurrencies like Ethereum, Litecoin and so on

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: Bitcoin has always been holding the majority of cryptocurrency market cap, and until that change, I think we will keep referring other crypto outside of Bitcoin as Altcoins. They come in many forms, from Ethereum to memecoins like Dogecoin. Not only does the functionality of altcoins span a wide range, from Ethereum supporting smart contracts to stablecoins pegged to real world assets anchoring their prices to them, but altcoins have generally lower market caps and less widespread adoption compared to Bitcoin. However, they do offer a lot of different functionalities that will further diversify the crypto market. That makes altcoins more than just alternatives to Bitcoin, some good altcoins actually would contribute to developing decentralized applications and finance.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on October 23, 2024, 08:17:12 AM~snipNice article  Apocollapse. I think I've come across an article similar to this in the past. However saying that bitcoin is the first crypto currency is also very correct but may seem a little vague for someone who really Keens into the contents of that article. Now personally I really never thought bitcoin was the first attempted crypto currency even before I read an article like this back then. And my reason was simply because in order to create something as secure, sophisticated and complex as bitcoin there must have been a couple of failed attempts in the past even if they weren't publicised.The idea of calling bitcoin the first crypto currency is because it was the FIRST SUCCESSFUL  crypto currency not really because it was the first attempted. Also generally the term altcoins was implemented to other coins so people literally call any coin that isn't Bitcoin and altcoin.Others like; meme coins,  and shit coins are like sub terms under altcoin. The idea  of altcoins was alternate coins aside the first crypto currency (BITCOIN) which was the cryptographic break through.

comments.body: Quote from: Mia Chloe on October 23, 2024, 12:35:42 PM...The idea  of altcoins was alternate coins aside the first crypto currency (BITCOIN) which was the cryptographic break through.It was not a cryptographic breakthrough; it was a novel concept called "Proof of Work" to address the double-spending problem.The cryptography behind Bitcoin was well known, but the way it was used was a breakthrough.Quote from: Mia Chloe on October 23, 2024, 12:35:42 PM...The idea of calling bitcoin the first crypto currency is because it was the FIRST SUCCESSFUL  crypto currency ...It wasn't the first successful cryptocurrency; others were as well (in the beginning), but they failed due to centralization and all the problems that come with it.We could argue about what 'success' means... so far, Bitcoin is a failure in terms of what it was meant to be: Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash SystemWhat we have today: Bitcoin: A CeX-to-CeX Electronic Property System

comments.body: Quote from: Babayan-nawu on October 23, 2024, 08:04:29 AMGood day to members of this great community.From my research,reading and studies I saw alots about  Bitcoin and Altcoin which still don't get it clearly specifically (Altcoin) well,Bitcoin is reefers to the first largest cryptocurrency and  the most widely accepted and recognized cryptocurrency with a strong security of high market capitalization.Now I learnt that the Altcoin  was lunched after Bitcoin and it was created by various individuals less widely accepted and lower market capitalization, Although I got understood the bitcoin clearly but my questions is now base on this Altcoin,since it was created by various individuals,does Altcoin deals with a specific cryptocurrency or many cryptocurrency ?Would the experienced expertise provide a neccessary examples and breakdown of this Altcoin to my level of understanding?Thank you all for putting me through.I want to believe that by now, you must have gotten a very understandable answer or explanation to your question since I believe this to be a very easy one for any one who have spent atleast, 6 months on this forum, such even though still a newbie, should already know the difference between bitcoin and Altcoins.But just incase you are still looking for that perfect answer with all simplicity, let me tell you that cryptocurrencies include both bitcoin and Altcoins..Bitcoin is a stand alone cryptocurrency and also the very first one of them all.While Altcoins is a general title that is given to all other cryptocurrencies that was created after Bitcoin - Altcoin in full simply means "Alternative coin" or "Alternative cryptocurrencies", they consist of all the cryptocurrencies that act as alternative to bitcoin.I hope this is understandable enough, and I wish you good luck in your quest learning about cryptocurrencies, all the best bud.
